channel.title: Massive new char bug
channel.description: IDK what i tweaked wrong but now when a new player logs in, they die constantly, and then the server lags off from overflow buffer or sumthing.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 20, 2007, 01:27:25 AM[/size][hr]ip is 1mixscape1.servegame.com if you wanan c it urself.

item.title: Massive new char bug
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

nope^^ there were like 857 people in my char folder after a week and a half, not at once but i was in testing and every time i turned it off, then back on, and got a new wave of players, people like it very much. well thats besides the point, i need to fix this bug

Read full topic

item.title: Massive new char bug
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

yea thats what i thought, but i dont think i edited it. were exactly is it at so i can look at it? my server is sweet, ive had a total of 850 players, and my server was only up for like a week. So once i get this fixed i can finish updating and open it permenantly on my new wifi connection…
